messages.title: Our record of delivery...
messages.content: This is just one of many new schemes to help schools and give every child a fair start in life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Schools in disadvantaged areas are receiving extra funds and improved facilities such as rebuilding schools across the country suffering most from wear and tear.
An £800 tax cut for all workers across the UK.

issues.education: Investment in rebuilding schools, free school meals saving local parents £400 a year.
issues.health: An extra £2 billion invested this year in our NHS

leaflet.personalStatement: I am the Liberal Democrat candidate for Hornsey and Wood Green.

contactInformation.address: First Floor Office, 628 High Street, London N8 7NX

quotes.text: Extra money for schools in disadvantaged areas, free school meals, and the Priority Schools Building Programme. These would not have happened without the Lib Dems in Government!

images.caption: Images of Lynne Featherstone, school children, and workers
